name: Epilator,2026 Upgraded Epilator for Women Rechargeable Cordless Hair Removal Device with LED Light & Dual Speeds, for Facial, Bikini, Arm, Leg, and Armpit
short_description: Efficient and Comfortable Full-Body Hair Removal This women's epilator features 36 precision tweezers and dual-speed settings to remove hair—from fine facial hair to coarse leg hair—quickly and with minimal discomfort, delivering smooth, long-lasting results in just minutes.

Precision Care for Face and Sensitive Areas Designed specifically for women's needs, it offers a gentle and precise hair removal experience for sensitive areas like the face and bikini line. The built-in LED light ensures no fine hair is missed, enabling safe and accurate epilation.

Safe, Irritation-Free Physical Epilation with Ergonomic Design Utilizing a safe physical plucking method and an ergonomic 90° rotating head, it glides smoothly along body contours to remove hair from the root without damaging the skin's surface.

True Versatility for 7 Key Body Areas Engineered for complete body care, it is clearly designated for use on seven key areas: face, lips, underarms, arms, legs, bikini line, and the bikini area—providing a comprehensive hair removal solution.

Long-Lasting Power with Flexible Charging Options Supports convenient USB charging and is compatible with multiple power sources (wall adapter, computer USB port, power bank, car charger), ensuring readiness for use at home, work, or on the go.

Compact, Lightweight, and Travel-Friendly Boasting a stylish, lightweight, and compact design (approximately 11 cm in length), it easily fits into a makeup bag or suitcase, making it an ideal companion for both home use and travel.

Intuitive Operation for Immediate Use Equipped with a clear charging indicator and a simple two-mode operation (low speed for sensitive skin, high speed for coarse hair), it allows users to start their grooming routine effortlessly, with no learning curve.

product_description: Warm tip: Please note the correct way to install the two poles of the battery, otherwise the epilator will not work. Benefits: No more time and money spent on salon appointments One-touch button design for first-timers and experienced users Mini size, hand-held design, cordless battery power, so you can travel without fear of distance Built-in LED light removes unwanted hairs from view for all-round hair removal The safe and waterproof removal head is designed to help you remove hair smoothly and without stubble, leaving your skin as smooth as silk without the need for additional tools Tips for use: 1. After epilation, use a mild, low chemical body wash for better results. 2. It is advisable to remove after about 15 minutes after a hot bath. This is when the pores are relaxed and helps to reduce the pain. 3. Hold the skin firmly with your other hand as this will help the hairs to come out more easily and visibly and reduce your discomfort. 4. Hold the epilator at 90° to get the most out of your skin and move it slowly along your skin contact at all times. However, please work against the direction of hair growth. 5. Please cut off long hair before use, otherwise the blades may stick or even malfunction. 6. The epilator body is not waterproof, please do not use it when bathing. 🎀PACKAGE INCLUDE Epilator x 1 Manual x1 Storage Bag x1 Clean Brush x1

short_description: Permanent hair reduction for face & body: includes 2 unique attachments designed for the curves of your body; comfortably use on body & face (for female face only, below the cheekbones)
Get at-home hair removal with salon-like results – you’ll have visible results in only 2 sessions⁵, and get to enjoy more than 90% hair removal in just 3 treatments³

Download the Philips Lumea free companion app to optimize your hair removal routine with smart reminders, handy tips & tricks; used by 2.1 million people worldwide
The #1 IPL hair removal brand globally⁶, chosen by over 6 million consumers worldwide; 74% of women who tried Philips Lumea say they would not go back to their previous hair removal method.¹³
product_description: Get Philips Lumea IPL 8000 series intense pulsed light (IPL) hair removal for women and men. Now available in the U.S.! Our Philips hair removal device is FDA-compliant and uses SenseIQ technology so you can enjoy safe at-home hair removal with salon-like results. Philips Lumea IPL hair removal is safe and effective. Patented Lumea IPL SmartPulse™ technology uses a unique formula of balanced light power, light color and pulse duration to deliver more than 90% hair removal in 3 treatments³, with visible results after 2 sessions.⁷ What is IPL hair removal? It's a skin-friendly alternative to shaving and laser hair removal! Our at-home hair removal device inhibits hair growth using gentle pulses of light. Your hair roots absorb the light, causing hair follicles to go into a resting phase. Hair sheds naturally, resulting in years of smooth skin.² No need to wear goggles! Skin Contact Sensors provide efficient eye protection, ensuring the device flashes only when in full contact with skin. Intelligent attachments offer easy & comfortable hair removal for men and women to perfectly fit your curves and adapt the treatment program to each body area. The SmartSkin sensor detects skin tone to indicate which of the five adjustable light settings is most comfortable for your skin. Download the Philips Lumea IPL app for personalized, full-body hair removal. Achieve better results and stay on schedule. Device is corded for uninterrupted treatments with full power. ¹ Measured on lower legs at 12-month follow-up, 84% of participants agree or strongly agree ² With ongoing monthly touch-ups following the indicated treatment schedule ³ Median results on legs ⁴ Bi-weekly treatments vs weekly treatments in first 4 weeks ⁵ Bi-weekly treatments vs weekly treatments of other brands in first 4 weeks ⁶ Source: Market leader research institute, retail value MAT Dec ’24. Outside US only ⁷ On lower legs, 81% of participants agree or strongly agree. Results vary per area ⁸ Face attachment is flat ⁹ Based on indicated areas ¹⁰ For side effects see packaging/user manual ¹¹ Median results on legs and face ¹²Median results on legs, bikini, face. Do not use on male neck and face ¹³ On legs, upper lip, bikini, armpits. Survey conducted with 1,341 Lumea IPL users in the Philips Lumea app.
